summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund in Aid of the Improvement of the Alley in Plat of Montbeacon, Et Al, by paving and otherwise improving the same under Local Improvement District No. 6714, as created by Ordinance 108372; authorizing the hiring of expert and consultant services therefor; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department.
